data.system_settings: Windows 10 Ultimate x64, latest Desktop Canary as of writing
data.actual_result: Right-click "add reactions" option on alert pins
data.expected_result: No "add reactions" right-click option on alert pins, Andy mentioned this should be fixed on the desktop-level.
data.short_description: Right-Click "Add Reaction" on alert pins should be removed as they actually show up on Android (possibly iOS)
data.steps_to_repro: - Right-click a "pinned a message to this channel" alert and add a reaction to it - Check the pin alert on an Android device (possible iOS) - There are reactions showing up.
